The fact that finches underwent such change is indisputable!

But what exactly was it that caused the finches’ outer appearance

to change?

No matter

how you look at it, of their tribe.that sure looks a lot like an

＊armadillo.

What!

What did you just say? That this giant fossil really looks like

an armadillo?

Yes. This fossil does not exist

on the earth today, but it is

very similar to smaller

modern animals

such as armadillos

and sloths.

Animals that don’t exist!

*Armadillo: A mammal about 40~70cm in length.
